dataMapping.title: Ad Load Optimization Timeline
dataMapping.subtitle: Scheduled ad load adjustments and viewer experience optimization
dataMapping.overallObjective: Primary ad load objective (e.g., 'Optimize ad load while maintaining 90% viewer retention')

phases.primaryLabel: Ad load phase name (e.g., 'Baseline Assessment', 'Load Reduction Phase', 'Revenue Recovery')
phases.description: Phase objectives and ad load strategy
phases.expectedOutcome: Expected ad load and retention outcomes
phases.budget: Revenue impact or investment (e.g., '-$50K revenue', '+$25K optimization cost')

milestones.milestoneLabel: Key milestone (e.g., 'Retention Target Achieved', 'Revenue Impact Assessed')

dependencies: Prerequisites (e.g., 'Viewer retention baseline established', 'A/B test framework ready')

successMetrics: Overall success criteria (e.g., 'Maintain 90% viewer retention', 'Revenue impact < 10%')
riskFactors: Risk factors (e.g., 'Viewer churn risk', 'Revenue loss potential', 'Advertiser satisfaction')
